isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING COMPRESSOR AND CLUTCH, TWO CYLINDER RECIPROCATING TYPE - After 01/01/1993 (R-134a) - OPERATION - MAGNETIC CLUTCH

svcproc.title: MAGNETIC CLUTCH
svcproc.para: During operation, electrical current flows into the field coil. The energized field coil, acting as an electromagnet, holds the clutch plate in contact with the pulley, setting the compressor in motion. When the cab interior reaches the desired temperature, the field coil is de-energized, the clutch plate is released from the pulley, and compressor operation stops.
